title: Texas Sues Google for Collecting Biometric Data Without Consent
description: Ken Paxton, the state attorney general, said products like Google Photos and the Nest camera had violated Texans’ privacy rights.
dc:creator: Kashmir Hill and David McCabe
media:credit: Brandon Thibodeaux for The New York Times
media:description: Google’s offices in Austin, Texas. The state’s attorney general has repeatedly taken on Big Tech companies in recent years.
